EmailTemplate.name: State of Independence Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for Requesting the MBO Partners Independent Workforce Index
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in learning about independent work in America.
The MBO Partners inaugural Independent Workforce Index is now ready for viewing as are supporting data slides (http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO%20Partners%20Independent%20Workforce%20Index%20%20Key%20Findings%20Summary.pdf?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRow5%2FmYJoDpwmWGd5mht7VzDtPj1OY6hBkvILiJK1TtuMFUGpsqOOScDg%3D%3D).
We look forward to staying in touch as we continue our year-long journey to understand, and better support, the 16-million-strong independent workforce in our nation.
MBO Partners State of Independence TeamÂ
Visit our mini site for more news (http://info.mbopartners.com/stateofindependence) Join us on Facebook at the State of Independence Page (http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-State-of-Independence/126879364075991?sk=wall) Declare Your Career Independence (http://info.mbopartners.com/declare.html)
